# [Interview #480: TGS Signing Report - Samadai, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=480#20)

#### Question

Did Shaidar Haran know Moridin had forbidden the Forsaken from rescuing Semirhage?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes he did, no further comment.
